root.name: Deephome
root.description: Deephome The Return, A Telleen Adventure is a text adventure released in 1999 by Joshua Wise. The game focuses on a Dwarf who returns to the abandoned city of Deephome in the west part of the world. The city is overrun by dark spirits and has been abandoned for hundreds of years. The dwarven reclaimer is sent to exorcise the spirits and get the city into running order once again. The game was released to mixed reviews in zines such as SPAG. A follow up text adventure called Eldantar was planned but never completed. In 2008 a point and click re-imagining of the game was begun under the small company 3 Magi Games, inc. However, after over a year of development, the game was abandoned due to staffing difficulties. It is unclear whether another Deephome game will be produced.

similar_games.game: Zork I: The Great Underground Empire
